issue.title: [CF 1478] Decimal Numbers
issue.body:
How can I see my debuffs in decimals like 5.4 > 5.3 > 5.2. They are integers at the moment and I couldn't find option to set them in decimal.


> Posted by CurseForge user Volvix | Imported from CurseForge issue #1478 | Raw

comments.body:
If you're talking about the text on the timer sweep ("Show timer text"), OmniCC allows you to customize this to a great extent.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
